description:
Take your personal data back with Incogni! Use code SciShow at the link below and get 60% off an annual plan: http://incogni.com/scishow 

When conditions are just right, one species can turn into hundreds in a short period of time. Welcome to the weird world of adaptive radiation. 

Hosted by: Jaida Elcock
----------
Support us for $8/month on Patreon and keep SciShow going!
https://www.patreon.com/scishow
Or support us directly: https://complexly.com/support
Join our SciShow email list to get the latest news and highlights: 
https://mailchi.mp/scishow/email
----------
Huge thanks go to the following Patreon supporters for helping us keep SciShow free for everyone forever: Odditeas , Garrett Galloway, Friso, DrakoEsper , Kenny Wilson, Lyndsay Brown, Jeremy Mattern, Jaap Westera, Rizwan Kassim, Harrison Mills, Jeffrey Mckishen, Matt Curls, Eric Jensen, Chris Mackey, Adam Brainard, Ash, You too can be a nice person, Piya Shedden, charles george, Alex Hackman, Kevin Knupp, Chris Peters,
title: A Fish In This Lake Evolved Into 850 Different Species
